post.body: I know. I am sad. Can't keep up with my earthspace friends.
Form Blazing Anthropomorphic Equine Love Sword!
Oh, that's why I'm getting so many hits on my centaur porn article. We done been picked up by a forum! http://tinyurl.com/3wogj3
Rollie brings you The Frobeast Friday Fun Page! Can spot the *all* the differences between these two pictures? http://tinyurl.com/3z9q54
Your Princess has been rated PG for pregnancy. I'm finally back from self-imposed exile. Full story lives here: http://tinyurl.com/67c7s5
You have no idea how hard it is to pull free from a blackhole. Light, gravity, love, and motivation all sucked away. PS. I'm almost back!
I've been slacking. In my absence, Rollie ate a bitch burrito http://tinyurl.com/65cp39 but never fear no hotsauce http://tinyurl.com/3tzzdb
Also, Rollie killed George Carlin. a) it was an accident b) he's sorry. http://tinyurl.com/5u6f9r
Let me show you how to turn the world on with your smile. How to take a nothing day & make it all seem worthwhile. http://tinyurl.com/3tjotk
Call on me. Spin, spin sugar.
The stars in your eyes weren't put there to stay. Love isn't love 'til you shit it away! http://tinyurl.com/4tz8k5
Also, I rubbed dirty panties all over the cockpit of Keith's lion. Take that master of all douchery.
Find out what happens in the blowjob finals *SPOILER* read the most relevant SATC review in the history of film. http://tinyurl.com/3g7ttg
Rollie has become a Rock 'n Roll Scientist for you! It's a battle to the radio death all over NY and NJ. http://tinyurl.com/6paxed
You're out of touch; I'm out of time. Google Image Therapy being served here: http://tinyurl.com/45r6py
Robeast Rollie accidentally likes a Rolling Stones song. What is the world coming to?
Working on a new move. Was it up, up, down, around, forward, forward, block?
Telling Keith he can go get those stoopid whores on Planet Arus to polish his lion for him. I've got my own lion to polish and wax.
If we were to ever form a band, Rollie and I, that band would be called *Scrabble Hate Fuck*. I play the electric triangle.
Robeast Rollie shares his love of both the wrestling and THE ULTIMATE WARRIOR --->He has returned and all the world will feel his wrath.
